about.subtitle: About Vistas
about.headline: Quality products within everyone's reach
about.innovationText: We are constantly looking to innovate and create new designs and styles to meet the changing needs of our customers.
about.comfortText: We design products that bring comfort and well-being to the interior of homes.

discover.title: Products that combine elegance and functionality
discover.text: Pieces that will not only beautify your space, but will also stand the test of time.

footer.aboutText: Passionate about Interior Design and motivated by the desire to offer the best to the Algerian consumer, the founders of Vistas made the decision to create this home textile company stemming from a combination of deep motivations and personal convictions.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are?
whoWeAre.description1: Welcome to Vistas, your preferred destination for exceptional textiles dedicated to the embellishment of your interior. Our company stands out for its commitment to quality, creativity and comfort.
whoWeAre.description2: Every piece we offer is the result of meticulous attention to detail and unparalleled craftsmanship. We carefully select materials to ensure not only their aesthetics, but also their long-term durability.

innovation.title: Innovation and Creativity
innovation.text: We are constantly looking to innovate and create new designs and styles to meet the changing needs of our customers.

comfort.title: Comfort and Well-being
comfort.text: We design products that bring comfort and well-being to the interior of homes.

customization.title: Tailor-made Customization
customization.text: We offer customized designs that meet the unique preferences of our customers.
